title: WTB T206 Seymour Throwing SC 350 Fact 25, Old Mill, and Pied 460 Fact 42
author: Blunder19

posts.post_title: WTB T206 Seymour Throwing SC 350 Fact 25, Old Mill, and Pied 460 Fact 42
posts.post_content:
Looking for these 3 cards... graded by PSA or SGC in 4-6 condition.

please PM me or email me if you have 1 for sale.

[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=437364&d=1611611217[/IMG]

[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=437365&d=1611611232[/IMG]

This is one that I have but in a lower grade than you are looking for.

Peace, Mike

[quote name="vtgmsc" post=2060123]This is the only one PSA has ever graded with that back combo....

[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=437364&d=1611611217[/IMG]

[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=437365&d=1611611232[/IMG]

As far as I know, this is the only one ever graded by PSA. I own it.

I'll keep an eye out for a higher graded example if it exists! Thanks!

Peace, Mike[/QUOTE]


Hi Mike,
There are a few raw and a PSA 3 and this 4.5 that I know of.

[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=437392&d=1611621622[/IMG]

I got duped by the old labels where they just said Sweet Caporal. I stand corrected! Thanks for pointing that out!

Mike
